00036 #ifndef SeVec3d_h
00037 #define SeVec3d_h
00038 
00039 #ifndef MAKEDEPEND
00040 #include <iostream>
00041 #include <math.h>
00042 #endif
00043 
00052 class SeVec3d
00053 {
00054  public:
00055 
00057     SeVec3d() {}
00058 
00060     SeVec3d( double v )
00061     { setValue( v, v, v ); }
00062 
00064     SeVec3d( double x, double y, double z )
00065     { setValue( x, y, z ); }
00066 
00068     SeVec3d( const double* v )
00069     { setValue( v[0], v[1], v[2] ); }
00070 
00072     SeVec3d( const float* v )
00073     { setValue( v[0], v[1], v[2] ); }
00074 
00076     typedef double array[3];
00077     operator array&() { return _vec; }
00078 
00080     double       &operator []( int i )          { return (_vec[i]); }
00081 
00083     const double operator []( int i ) const    { return (_vec[i]); }
00084 
00086     SeVec3d &operator =( const SeVec3d &v )
00087     { _vec[0]=v[0]; _vec[1]=v[1]; _vec[2]=v[2]; return *this; }
00088 
00090     SeVec3d &operator *=( double d )
00091     { _vec[0]*=d; _vec[1]*=d; _vec[2]*=d; return *this; }
00092 
00094     SeVec3d &operator /=( double d )
00095     { *this *= 1/d; return *this; }
00096 
00098     SeVec3d &operator +=( const SeVec3d &v )
00099     { _vec[0]+=v[0]; _vec[1]+=v[1]; _vec[2]+=v[2]; return *this; } 
00100 
00102     SeVec3d &operator -=( const SeVec3d &v )
00103     { _vec[0]-=v[0]; _vec[1]-=v[1]; _vec[2]-=v[2]; return *this; } 
00104     
00106     SeVec3d operator -() const
00107     { return SeVec3d( -_vec[0], -_vec[1], -_vec[2] ); }
00108 
00110     bool operator ==( const SeVec3d &v ) const
00111     { return (_vec[0] == v[0] && _vec[1] == v[1] && _vec[2] == v[2]); }
00112 
00114     bool operator !=( const SeVec3d &v ) const
00115     { return !(*this == v); }
00116 
00118     SeVec3d operator *( double d ) const
00119     { return SeVec3d( _vec[0]*d, _vec[1]*d, _vec[2]*d ); }
00120     
00122     SeVec3d operator /( double d ) const
00123     { return *this * (1/d); }
00124     
00126     friend SeVec3d operator *( double d, const SeVec3d &v )
00127     { return v * d; }
00128     
00130     SeVec3d operator *( const SeVec3d &v ) const
00131     { return SeVec3d(_vec[0]*v[0], _vec[1]*v[1], _vec[2]*v[2]); }
00132 
00134     SeVec3d operator /( const SeVec3d &v ) const
00135     { return SeVec3d(_vec[0]/v[0], _vec[1]/v[1], _vec[2]/v[2]); }
00136 
00138     SeVec3d operator +( const SeVec3d &v ) const
00139     { return SeVec3d( _vec[0]+v[0], _vec[1]+v[1], _vec[2]+v[2] ); }
00140 
00142     SeVec3d operator -( const SeVec3d &v ) const
00143     { return SeVec3d( _vec[0]-v[0], _vec[1]-v[1], _vec[2]-v[2]); }
00144 
00146     friend std::ostream & operator <<( std::ostream  &os, const SeVec3d &v )
00147     { os << "(" << v[0] << "," << v[1] << "," << v[2] << ")"; return os; }
00148 
00150     void getValue( double &x, double &y, double &z ) const
00151     { x = _vec[0]; y = _vec[1]; z = _vec[2]; }
00152     
00154     const double *getValue() const
00155     { return _vec; }
00156 
00158     void setValue( double x, double y, double z )
00159     { _vec[0] = x; _vec[1] = y; _vec[2] = z; }
00160     
00162     void setValue( const double* v )
00163     { _vec[0] = v[0]; _vec[1] = v[1]; _vec[2] = v[2]; }
00164 
00166     double dot( const SeVec3d &v ) const
00167     { return _vec[0]*v[0] + _vec[1]*v[1] + _vec[2]*v[2]; }
00168 
00170     SeVec3d cross( const SeVec3d &v ) const
00171     { return SeVec3d(_vec[1]*v[2] - _vec[2]*v[1],
00172                      _vec[2]*v[0] - _vec[0]*v[2],
00173                      _vec[0]*v[1] - _vec[1]*v[0]); }
00174     
00176     void negate()
00177     { _vec[0]*=-1; _vec[1]*=-1; _vec[2]*=-1; }
00178 
00180     double length() const
00181     { return sqrt( _vec[0]*_vec[0]+_vec[1]*_vec[1]+_vec[2]*_vec[2] ); }
00182 
00184     SeVec3d normalized() const 
00185     {
00186         double len = length();
00187         if ( len ) return *this / len;
00188         else return 0.0;
00189     }
00190 
00192     void normalize()
00193     {
00194         double len = length();
00195         if ( len ) *this /= len;
00196     }
00197 
00199     SeVec3d orthogonal() const {
00200         return SeVec3d( _vec[1]+_vec[2], _vec[2]-_vec[0], -_vec[0]-_vec[1] );
00201     }
00202 
00207     double angle( const SeVec3d &v ) const
00208     {   double len = this->length()*v.length();
00209         if (len == 0) return 0;
00210         return acos(this->dot(v) / len);
00211     }
00212 
00217     SeVec3d rotateBy( const SeVec3d &axis, double angle ) const
00218     {
00219         double c = cos(angle), s = sin(angle);
00220         const SeVec3d& v = *this;
00221         return c*v + (1-c)*v.dot(axis)*axis - s*v.cross(axis);
00222     }
00223     
00224  private:
00225 
00227     double  _vec[3];
00228 };
00229 
00230 
00231 #endif
